languages.text: {n}Щелкнув клешней мехадендрита, Паскаль указывает на татуировки, охватывающие шею мужчины, и произносит:{/n} "Согласно маркировке, единица распознана как представитель вспомогательного персонала семнадцатой категории. Запрашиваю совершение надлежащего ритуала приветствия". {n}Суровые слова сопровождает бинарная трель.{/n}

{n}Pasqal clicks his mechadendrite's claw, points to the tattoos covering the man's neck, and says,{/n} "Based on these markings, the unit has been identified as a member of Category 17 auxiliary staff. Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Щелкнув клешней мехадендрита, Паскаль указывает на татуировки, охватывающие шею мужчины, и произносит:{/n} "Согласно маркировке, единица распознана как представитель вспомогательного персонала семнадцатой категории. Запрашиваю совершение надлежащего ритуала приветствия". {n}Суровые слова сопровождает бинарная трель.{/n}

Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは機械触手の爪をカチカチ鳴らし、男の首のあちこちに刻まれたタトゥーを指して話す。{/n}「これらの印に基づくと、このユニットはカテゴリー17の予備人員のひとりと識別されます。適切なあいさつの儀式を実行するよう要請する」{n}ビンハリック音とともに厳格な言葉が発せられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks his mechadendrite's claw, points to the tattoos covering the man's neck, and says,{/n} "Based on these markings, the unit has been identified as a member of Category 17 auxiliary staff. Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは機械触手の爪をカチカチ鳴らし、男の首のあちこちに刻まれたタトゥーを指して話す。{/n}「これらの印に基づくと、このユニットはカテゴリー17の予備人員のひとりと識別されます。適切なあいさつの儀式を実行するよう要請する」{n}ビンハリック音とともに厳格な言葉が発せられる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡机械触须的爪子发出咔哒一声，指向男人脖子上的纹身，随后开了口。{/n}“根据这些标记，该单位识别为17类辅助人员的其中一员。我要求你进行适当的敬礼仪式。”{n}他严厉的话语中伴随着一串二进制颤音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks his mechadendrite's claw, points to the tattoos covering the man's neck, and says,{/n} "Based on these markings, the unit has been identified as a member of Category 17 auxiliary staff. Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡机械触须的爪子发出咔哒一声，指向男人脖子上的纹身，随后开了口。{/n}“根据这些标记，该单位识别为17类辅助人员的其中一员。我要求你进行适当的敬礼仪式。”{n}他严厉的话语中伴随着一串二进制颤音。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après avoir fait cliqueter les griffes de sa mécadendrite, Pasqal désigne le cou de l'homme recouvert de tatouages :{/n} « D'après ces marques, cette unité est identifiée comme membre du personnel auxiliaire de catégorie dix-sept. Rituel de salutations approprié exigé. » {n}Ses paroles sont accompagnées de trilles binhaires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks his mechadendrite's claw, points to the tattoos covering the man's neck, and says,{/n} "Based on these markings, the unit has been identified as a member of Category 17 auxiliary staff. Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir fait cliqueter les griffes de sa mécadendrite, Pasqal désigne le cou de l'homme recouvert de tatouages :{/n} « D'après ces marques, cette unité est identifiée comme membre du personnel auxiliaire de catégorie dix-sept. Rituel de salutations approprié exigé. » {n}Ses paroles sont accompagnées de trilles binhaires.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal chasquea su garra de mecadendrita, señala los tatuajes que cubren el cuello del hombre y dice:{/n} «Basándome en esas marcas, esta unidad pertenece al personal auxiliar de categoría 17. Solicitando realización del ritual de saludo apropiado». {n}Mientras pronuncia estas severas palabras, se escucha un trino binario.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks his mechadendrite's claw, points to the tattoos covering the man's neck, and says,{/n} "Based on these markings, the unit has been identified as a member of Category 17 auxiliary staff. Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal chasquea su garra de mecadendrita, señala los tatuajes que cubren el cuello del hombre y dice:{/n} «Basándome en esas marcas, esta unidad pertenece al personal auxiliar de categoría 17. Solicitando realización del ritual de saludo apropiado». {n}Mientras pronuncia estas severas palabras, se escucha un trino binario.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal klickt mit seiner Mechadendriten-Klaue, deutet auf die Tätowierungen am Hals des Mannes und sagt:{/n} "Diese Markierungen identifizieren die Einheit als Mitglied des Hilfspersonals Kategorie 17. Erbitte Durchführung des geeigneten Begrüßungsrituals." {n}Ein binhärer Triller begleitet die strengen Worte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks his mechadendrite's claw, points to the tattoos covering the man's neck, and says,{/n} "Based on these markings, the unit has been identified as a member of Category 17 auxiliary staff. Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal klickt mit seiner Mechadendriten-Klaue, deutet auf die Tätowierungen am Hals des Mannes und sagt:{/n} "Diese Markierungen identifizieren die Einheit als Mitglied des Hilfspersonals Kategorie 17. Erbitte Durchführung des geeigneten Begrüßungsrituals." {n}Ein binhärer Triller begleitet die strengen Worte.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, mekadentritinin pençelerini takırdatarak adamın boynunu kaplayan dövmeleri işaret ediyor ve konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bu işaretlere göre bu birim, 17. Kategori destek personeli olarak tanımlanmış. Uygun selamlama ritüelinin sergilenmesi talep ediliyor." {n}Bu sert sözcüklere ikilidil bir ses eşlik ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal clicks his mechadendrite's claw, points to the tattoos covering the man's neck, and says,{/n} "Based on these markings, the unit has been identified as a member of Category 17 auxiliary staff. Requesting performance of appropriate salutatory ritual." {n}A binharic trill accompanies the stern words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal mekadentritinin pençelerini takırdatarak adamın boynunu kaplayan dövmeleri işaret ediyor ve konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Bu işaretlere göre bu birim Kategori 17 destek personellerinin bir üyesi olarak tanımlanmış. Uygun selamlama ritüelinin sergilenmesi talep ediliyor." {n}Bu sert sözcüklere ikilidil bir vibrato eşlik ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
